value:
Neimi and I... We've got no home to
return to. It's up to me to make sure
we don't go through that again.

You may see my path as a dark
road...but some of us don't know
anything other than a thief's life.

You look tired. My mother taught me
a secret remedy...I think it was for
pimples, but it helps insomnia too!

I'm gonna have a quick look around
the enemy camp. Backup? Nah, it'll
be easier if I go alone.

Oof! Sorry for bumping into you.
Huh? Oh, relax. I didn't pickpocket
anything...this time. Ha ha!

You're $Nu, right?$k$pGood. Here, this is for you. And with
that, my job here is done. Later!

How do you like that? Pretty good,
huh? Ha ha ha! Oh, please. You're
embarrassing me...

Great! This is so encouraging! With
this, I can continue fighting for my
friends!

I can't stop now... Neimi needs me...
I have to push through this!

You value my service? Neat! This will
help me pay you back twice over.

Hey. I'm a handy guy to have around.
I know I can help you out. You won't
regret taking me on, I swear!

Focusing on your enemies is good
and all, but what about your friends?
Aren't they just as important?$k$pIn my opinion, Prince Alfonse and
everyone else are a lot like Prince
Ephraim and Princess Eirika.$k$pI mean, they both have a strong
sense of justice and a pure heart,
but that's just what worries me.$k$pSometimes people with their head
in the clouds need friends like us to
keep them grounded, you know?$k$pI just want what's best for Askr,
so that no other village gets torched
by bandits like mine did.
せやっ
How 'bout that!?
うわっ
この野郎…！
Sorry about this!
Light work.
And here we go!
Guaranteed results!
Neimi...
Ha!
Name's Colm. I'm a handy guy to have around. I know I can help you out.
What? I didn't steal anything! Seriously!
Prince Ephraim hates studying. He's just like me!
Neimi and I... We've got no home to return to.
People in my... profession... have sharp eyes. Far-off enemies? I'll spot 'em.
Neimi... I'm the only one who can make you cry.
Stick with me—I promise you won't regret your decision.
Fine with me.
Huh?
Don't worry.
